page.shortlink: api client api a5 d date relative generate year method

argument.name: year
argument.description: The delta in years between two dates.

return.name: year
return.description: The correctly formatted representation of the delta in years.

page.description: Method used to generate how years should be representation in a relative date. For example turning "1" into "1 year", and "3" into "3 years". See *[link:Date.toRelative]*.
